definition: wooden sword
surname Mu
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword

sentences.english: The boys played soldier with dummy swords made of wood.
sentences.chinese: 男孩們用木頭做的假木劍玩打仗遊戲。

sentences.english: Unexpectatively, Xin, a Chinese family name makes track for of the wood sword will also send out so brilliant light of fire.
sentences.chinese: 想不到，辛追的木劍也會發出這麼燦爛的火光。

sentences.english: Hence, the Yu text Yi minister brought up the lumber sword that he picks out to practice.
sentences.chinese: 於是，宇文逸臣提起他選中的木劍演練了起來。
